lead_paragraph: The Fighting Irish, who were not even in the A.C.C. three years ago, won their first conference tournament as Duke and North Carolina, teams that once dominated the event, were shut out again.

headline.main: An A.C.C. Breakthrough for Notre Dame
headline.print_headline: An A.C.C. Breakthrough for Notre Dame

snippet: The Fighting Irish, who were not even in the A.C.C. three years ago, won their first conference tournament as Duke and North Carolina, teams that once dominated the event, were shut out again.
